comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.112 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:


Updated firefox to Firefox 6, minutes ago.

I run Windows XP, SP3


Actual results:

Firefox won't open.


I get this message:

"XML Parsing Error: undefined entity
Location: chrome://browser/content/browser.xul
Line Number 233, Column 5: <key id="key_scratchpad" keycode="&scratchpad.keycode;" modifiers="shift"
----^"

NB!! I cannot open firefox 6 in SAFE MODE "XML Parsing Error:either, same message^^



Expected results:

Firefox should have opened after update to Firefox 6
